mentionedBy.name: Okta Inc.
mentionedBy.notes: Top alternative with 42.62% market share. Often described as 'Okta-lite' in a good way. Offers all IAM essentials (SSO, MFA, user provisioning, policy management) with simpler UI and faster time to value. Largest competitor by market share.
